mapper.insert: insert into orderitem(order_id, product_id, buynum) values(#{order.id}, #{product.id}, #{buynum})
insert into orders(id, money, receiverAddress, receiverName, receiverPhone, user_id) values(#{id}, #{money}, #{receiverAddress}, #{receiverName}, #{receiverPhone}, #{user.id})
mapper.update: update orders set paystate = 1 where id = #{out_trade_no}
update products set pnum = pnum - #{buynum} where id = #{product.id}
